text: I read the spec of hyperledger/fabric. I don’t see any thing about proof of work. I just see it mentions proof of agreement. Could you please tell me about proof of work, proof of agreement on hyperledger/fabric?

fabric uses PBFT as its consensus algorithm ( chapter 5 in the protocol-spec doc ),  not proof of work. We're also working on a new architecture <https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/wiki/Next-Consensus-Architecture-Proposal>  that will allow plugins of other consensus protocols

attachments.title: hyperledger/fabric
attachments.text: fabric - Fabric is a blockchain project in Incubation proposed to the community and documented at <https://goo.gl/RYQZ5N>. Information on what Incubation entails can be found in the Hyperledger Proj...
